physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white photograph. It is a photograph of a meeting
 in a room that holds a semi-circular table on the bottom-right
 with four rows of tables facing it on the top-left. There is a large group of men seated on the tables
 each with a nameplate in front of them. There are no tears or folds seen on the photograph.

sgcool_label_text:George Lowe was a member of the British Expedition that saw Sir Edmund Hillary scale Mount Everest on 29 May 1953. In September that year
 Lowe accompanied Hillary on a visit to Singapore to deliver their first Everest lecture outside of New Zealand at the Odeon Theatre to an audience of 1
620 schoolchildren. This photograph album
 with the coat of arms of the City of Singapore in gilt on the cover
 was presented to Lowe as a souvenir of his visit.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album presented to George Lowe as a souvenir of his visit to Singapore George Lowe album: Photograph of Singapore City Council meeting
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It is a photograph of a meeting, in a room that holds a semi-circular table on the bottom-right, with four rows of tables facing it on the top-left. There is a large group of men seated on the tables, each with a nameplate in front of them. There are no tears or folds seen on the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Photographs Photograph albums Souvenir Lowe, George, 1924-2013 Hillary, Edmund, 1919-2008 Meetings City councils
metadata.sgcool_label_text: George Lowe was a member of the British Expedition that saw Sir Edmund Hillary scale Mount Everest on 29 May 1953. In September that year, Lowe accompanied Hillary on a visit to Singapore to deliver their first Everest lecture outside of New Zealand at the Odeon Theatre to an audience of 1,620 schoolchildren. This photograph album, with the coat of arms of the City of Singapore in gilt on the cover, was presented to Lowe as a souvenir of his visit.
